title: How to write a report format - Quora

response.answer_text: Word. The word. If the report is short, the front cover can include any detail, such as theauthor(s) and the date prepared, that you feel is necessary. ... Description. ... Please introduce yourself. ... Body. Body. Body. ... Talk about it. ... Conclusion. Conclusion. ... Recommendations. ... Appendices.
MLA is the way to go for general report writing. This software can help with all your citations as it has for me. Either APA or MLA.
